title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Thoroughly gather, document, and prioritize the requirements for the ExitInterviewAnalyzer system. This includes determining the types of data to be analyzed (e.g., text responses, numerical ratings), the desired outputs (e.g., trend reports, actionable insights, recommendations), and the stakeholders involved (e.g., HR department, executive leadership). Also, consider the data privacy and security implications, and outline the process for handling sensitive information in a manner compliant with relevant regulations such as GDPR or HIPAA. Ensure that the requirements are comprehensive, aligned with the project's overall goals, and can be easily understood by all involved parties. Provide clear examples or use cases to illustrate the expected functionality, emphasizing the importance of interpretability and actionability of results. Include any specific functionalities or integrations required for seamless data flow (e.g., API connections with HR systems). Upon completion, this task will be passed on to the project manager for further development planning.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the system, including the components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Design Data Model for Exit Interview Analyzer System
description: Design the data model for storing and analyzing exit interview data, including the database schema, data structures, and data access layer. The data model should support efficient querying and analysis of the data, including text analysis and sentiment analysis on interview responses. Consider the different types of data that need to be stored, such as employee information, interview responses, analysis results, timestamps for interviews and updates, and any additional contextual data that may influence the analysis. Ensure that the data model supports privacy and security requirements for storing sensitive employee information, such as anonymization techniques (e.g., hashing, pseudonymization), proper access controls, and secure storage solutions. It would also be beneficial to include a versioning system for data updates and improvements over time. Lastly, consider integrating the data model with other systems or services for more comprehensive analysis, while ensuring that all interfaces meet our organization's API standards.

title: Implement Data Ingestion
description: Implement the components responsible for ingesting and preprocessing exit interview data from various sources.

title: Develop Data Analysis Algorithms
description: Develop the algorithms and techniques for analyzing exit interview data, such as natural language processing, sentiment analysis, and trend detection.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for visualizing and interacting with the analyzed exit interview data.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls - ExitInterviewAnalyzer
description: Implement robust security measures and access controls to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of exit interview data within the ExitInterviewAnalyzer system. This task involves implementing necessary authentication, authorization, and encryption mechanisms. Include a detailed design for the data flow and storage, and consider potential vulnerabilities in the architecture.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the system meets the specified requirements.

title: Prepare Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides to facilitate system deployment, maintenance, and user training.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the ExitInterviewAnalyzer system to the production environment, and set up monitoring and logging mechanisms to ensure its proper functioning.
